translation.ja: “モール”が彗星にセットされた頃です

translation.en: The moles are, well, they're what they sound like.
They are drilling machines that burrow to a depth of 100 meters,
translation.ja: 地下100メートルまで掘り進み―

translation.en: where they wait to be detonated.
Each one carries a 5,000-kiloton warhead.
translation.ja: 個々の爆発力は5000キロトンに及びます

translation.en: How's our time?
It's getting tight. 1:36:30.
It's taking too long.
What happens if they do not get off the comet's surface in time?
translation.ja: 日が昇るまでに出発できないと？

translation.en: The sun striking the comet will cause the temperature to rise 350 degrees in just a few minutes
translation.ja: 太陽が地表の温度を数秒で176度まで上げ―

translation.en: and activate the high-speed gas jets.
Well, if that happens, it will be like trying to work in a minefield.
translation.ja: そうなれば 辺りは地雷原と同じです

translation.en: [Tanner on radio] Mark, what's your mole 4 readout?
[Mark] Mole 4 running true at 75 feet.
translation.ja: 現在 地下23メートル

translation.en: Son of a bitch.
-[Mark] What? -It's stuck.
Try backing it up.
-[Andrea] What's your depth? -Seventy-five feet.
Is that enough?
No. That'll just break pieces off the surface.
That's not deep enough.
Yeah, Fish, I know that's not deep enough.
-I'm going in. -[Mark] Oren, no.
translation.ja: 潜ってくる オーレン　よせ

translation.en: [Oren] No, I'm gonna see if I can free it up.
Stand by, tether attached.
All right, I gotcha.
[Andrea] Oren, suit pressure, 3.5.
-How's my time? -[Tanner] 23:57.
Another six minutes, they won't have time to get back to us.
Blow the tethers. Let's go get 'em.
If we go after them, we may not have enough fuel to get off the surface.
translation.ja: 燃料が足りなくなるわ

translation.en: Blow the goddamn tethers.
Mole 3 at depth. We're heading your way, Oren.
[Tanner] Calculate exactly how much prop we need to get off this rock.
translation.ja: 離脱に必要な燃料を見てろ

translation.en: We'll shut it down when we hit it.
Will do.
[Oren] It opens up into a cave down here. Mole got jammed against the side.
translation.ja: 裂け目に落ちて岩に引っかかってる

translation.en: [Gus] Okay, Fish, Team two at location four.
Give me your hand.
-What the hell happened? -I don't know. I don't know.
translation.ja: どうした？ 分からん　突然23メートルで“モール”が止まった

translation.en: Everything was going great, and we got jammed up at 75 feet.
translation.ja: 分からん　突然23メートルで“モール”が止まった

translation.en: Okay, hold up. [grunting]
[Oren] All right, try backing it up.
Roger that.
-That's it. -[Tanner] A little more. A little more.
Shut it down.
No, they always put extra in these tanks.
Fish, shut it down.
Come on, you bastard! Come on! Time!
translation.ja: クソッ　動け！ 時間は？

translation.en: [Tanner] 1:02. Figured we'd better pick you kids up after school.
[Tanner] Check your six, 100 yards.
[Gus] I think we'd better hurry, boys.
All right, it's going! It's going!
Mole's at 125 feet.
The sun's rising behind you. It's coming up fast.
Face shields down!
Oh, Christ!
Get the hell out of there!
-[screaming] -[Tanner] Oren, get your visor down. Get your visor down!
My eyes!
-[Mark] All right, we got him. -[Oren] Oh, God!
My eyes!
[Andrea] Oh, God, we're losing one.
He's got escape velocity, 1,000 feet and climbing.
Mark, Mikhail, get the hell out of there!
[Tanner] Firing primary thrusters.
-Payload doors still open. -Close 'em as we go.
[Tanner on TV] Houston, all moles are at depth. Nukes hot and ready.
translation.ja: “モール”は地下にセット核爆破 準備よし

translation.en: We lost Partenza to explosive outgassing.
translation.ja: 医療担当のガスを失った

translation.en: And Monash is injured.
We have to go get Gus.
[Tanner] There's no time for that. Repressurize the cargo bay.
translation.ja: 時間がない　隔室に空気を

translation.en: He's going to die out there! We can still find him. He has a beacon.
translation.ja: 死ぬぞ　信号を追えば…

translation.en: [Tanner] I don't have time to argue with you. Just sit down, be quiet.
translation.ja: 議論のヒマはない黙って座ってろ

translation.en: Turn on the fuckin' locator!
We've used most of our propellant to get us out of the coma.
translation.ja: 離陸で燃料を使ったわ

translation.en: We can't just leave him. We have to go back.
If we go back for Gus, we all die.
We can't just leave him in space!
[whispering] Sit down, Mick. Sit down.
It's okay.
[Jenny] The Messiah has safely lifted off the comet.
translation.ja: “メサイア”は無事彗星を離脱

translation.en: But sadly, Gus Partenza has been lost.
Gus Partenza, a native of Harrisburg, Pennsylvania,
translation.ja: ペンシルベニア出身のガスは―

translation.en: and graduate of Carnegie-Mellon University,
translation.ja: カーネギー･メロン大学を卒業

translation.en: joined the NASA space program shortly after completing his medical training at Duke University.
translation.ja: デューク大で医学の研修後ＮＡＳＡの宇宙計画に参加

translation.en: Dr. Partenza was selected specifically for this mission, not only for his medical expertise,
translation.ja: 今回の任務では単に医療技術だけでなく―

translation.en: but also for his dedication to the advancement of space technology.
translation.ja: 彼の宇宙技術も期待されていました

translation.en: With the loss of Dr. Gus Partenza and with Oren Monash injured,
translation.ja: ガスを亡くしオーレンも負傷

translation.en: Captain Spurgeon Tanner is now in charge of the mission.
translation.ja: 現在 任務はタナー船長が遂行中です

translation.en: The Messiah has successfully docked with the Orion-powered boosters
translation.ja: “メサイア”は再び“オリオン”と合体

translation.en: and is now prepared to detonate the bombs planted on Wolf-Beiderman.
translation.ja: 彗星に仕掛けた核爆弾の起爆準備中です

translation.en: The Messiah's exterior-mounted camera will show us the detonation,
translation.ja: 核爆発の衝撃範囲から脱出できしだい―

translation.en: but not before being temporarily blocked out by the nuclear blast.
translation.ja: 爆発の模様をカメラで送る予定です

translation.en: Once again, let me remind you, there is a 20-second delay,
translation.ja: 映像が届くのは20秒後ですから―

translation.en: so when the picture comes back to us,
the comet should already have been knocked off its present course.
translation.ja: 彗星の軌道は外れているはずです

translation.en: [Tanner] Prepare to remove safeties and fire.
[Mikhail] Safeties removed.
Weapons armed.
Three, two, one...
Now.
[Jenny] So now we're just waiting for the picture to come back.
translation.ja: 映像が戻るまで待ちます

translation.en: Decompression in area six.
[Mark] Mick! I'll get the halon!
[man] Yes. I'm still here.
[man] We're live in ten seconds.
Cue the president.
Mr. President, five, four, three...
Hello, America.
It is my unhappy duty to report to you that the Messiah has failed.
translation.ja: つらい報告ですが“メサイア”は失敗しました

translation.en: This computer-enhanced radar image from Houston shows how the detonation succeeded,
translation.ja: コンピューター画面で爆発は確認しましたが

translation.en: however, did not destroy the comet. There are now two pieces.
translation.ja: 彗星は破壊されず２つに割れました

translation.en: One six miles wide, the other, a mile and a half.
translation.ja: 大きさは10キロと2.4キロの２個で

translation.en: Both are still on a path towards Earth.
translation.ja: 地球に向かっています

translation.en: We've lost communication with the Messiah spacecraft,
translation.ja: “メサイア”とは交信が途絶え

translation.en: although we continue to track it visually.
translation.ja: 今 行方を追っています

translation.en: We don't know how many are alive. We don't know their condition.
translation.ja: 生存者の数も状況も分かりません

translation.en: Now we have to make some decisions together. What do we do?
translation.ja: これから道を決めねばなりません

translation.en: You have a choice. We have a choice. Right now.
translation.ja: 我々は どの道を選ぶのか今ここで…

translation.en: Ever since the comet was discovered, we've been hoping and working for the best,
translation.ja: 彗星の発見以来我々は最善を願いつつ―

translation.en: but we've also been planning for the worst.
translation.ja: 最悪の事態にも備えてきました

translation.en: Our strategy has been twofold.
First, our Strategic Missile Command
is preparing to coordinate with the Russians a massive strike of Titan missiles to intercept the comets.
translation.ja: ロシアと共に 彗星に大量の核ミサイルを撃ちます

translation.en: If we can deflect these comets enough, they will bounce harmlessly off our atmosphere
translation.ja: 強い衝撃を与えれば地球に衝突する前に

translation.en: and head on out into space.
translation.ja: 軌道をそらせるでしょう

translation.en: Unfortunately, the Titans cannot be launched until the comets are only a few hours away.
translation.ja: ただミサイルは 彗星が接近せねば撃てません

translation.en: And while we are confident the missile attack will succeed,
translation.ja: この作戦の成功を信じています

translation.en: it is only prudent that we now take cautionary steps to ensure the continuation of our way of life.
translation.ja: しかし万一 彗星が地球に衝突した場合に備えて

translation.en: To guarantee that there will be enough of us left to rebuild a new world
translation.ja: 人類が生き残り 新世界を構築できるように

translation.en: in the unlikely event that the comets do strike the Earth.
translation.ja: 我々は準備をしてきました

translation.en: So in the soft limestone of Missouri,
translation.ja: 政府はミズーリ州の石灰岩地帯に―

translation.en: we've been preparing a network of immense caves, and they're almost finished.
translation.ja: 巨大な地下都市を建設しほぼ完成させました

translation.en: And we can put a million people in them.
translation.ja: そこに100万人を収容します

translation.en: And that million people can survive there, underground, for two years,
translation.ja: その100万人は２年間地下で暮らします

translation.en: until the air clears and the dust settles.
translation.ja: 大気が浄化されチリが収まるまでです

translation.en: Now, the cave is more than a dormitory. It's our new Noah's Ark.
translation.ja: まさに“ノアの方(はこ)舟”というわけです

translation.en: We're storing seeds and seedlings, plants, animals, enough to start over.
translation.ja: 新世界への殻物の種植物 動物も運び込みます

translation.en: On August 10th, a computer will randomly select 800,000 Americans
translation.ja: ８月10日　コンピューターが任意の80万人を選びます

translation.en: to join the 200,000 scientists, doctors, engineers,
translation.ja: すでに選ばれた20万人の科学者 医師 技術者―

translation.en: teachers, soldiers, and artists who have already been chosen.
translation.ja: 教師 芸術家がそこに加わります

translation.en: Other countries are preparing similar caves
along whatever lines they feel are best to preserve their way of life.
translation.ja: 生存のための道を考えています

translation.en: This is ours.
Beginning tonight and continuing until the crisis passes,
translation.ja: 今夜から危機が過ぎるまで―

translation.en: I am declaring a state of martial law.
The armed forces and the national guard are working with local law enforcement.
translation.ja: 軍隊 州兵 警察が警備に当たります

translation.en: A national curfew begins at midnight tonight.
translation.ja: 厳戒令は今夜12時からです

translation.en: Now, wherever you are, go home.
translation.ja: 皆さん　すぐにご帰宅を

translation.en: Stay off the roads after sunset.
Crimes against persons or property
translation.ja: 強盗や略奪などの犯罪は容赦なく―

translation.en: will be dealt with swiftly and harshly.
translation.ja: 強盗や略奪などの犯罪は容赦なく― 処罰します

translation.en: News stations around the nation are being faxed copies
translation.ja: 抽選の詳細は放送局を通じて

translation.en: of the lottery procedure as we speak,
translation.ja: 抽選の詳細は放送局を通じて すぐ皆さんにお知らせします

translation.en: and they'll be broadcasting the details to you in a few moments.
translation.ja: すぐ皆さんにお知らせします

translation.en: I wish...
Wishing is wrong.
It's the wrong word right now. That's not what I mean.
translation.ja: そんな言葉は適当ではない

translation.en: What I mean is...
I believe in God.
Relax.
[President Beck] I know a lot of you don't, but I still want to offer a prayer,
translation.ja: 信じない人もいるだが私は祈ります

translation.en: for our survival.
Mine included.
Because I believe that God, whomever you hold that to be,
translation.ja: なぜなら 私は神が祈りを聞いてくれると―

translation.en: hears all prayers, even if sometimes the answer is no.
translation.ja: 信じているからですその答えが“ノー”でも

translation.en: So may the Lord bless you.
May the Lord keep you.
May the Lord lift up his divine countenance upon you,
and give you peace.
[woman] And in five, four, three, two...
We now have the details for the national lottery.
translation.ja: 抽選の詳細が分かりました

translation.en: Those of you who have been preselected
translation.ja: すでに選ばれている人は

translation.en: will be notified within the next few minutes.
translation.ja: すぐに連絡が行きます

translation.en: For the rest, on the night of August 10th,
those whose Social Security numbers
translation.ja: コンピューターが社会保障番号を任意に選び

translation.en: have been randomly selected by computer will be notified.
translation.ja: コンピューターが社会保障番号を任意に選び 連絡されます

translation.en: While some Americans over 50 years of age
translation.ja: 50歳以上で― すでに選ばれている人は

translation.en: have been preselected for the Ark
translation.ja: すでに選ばれている人は

translation.en: due to their expertise in a necessary field of study,
translation.ja: 各分野に必要な人々です

translation.en: no men and women over 50 in the general population will be included in the lottery.
translation.ja: 一般の50歳以上の人は抽選の対象とはなりません

translation.en: The evac...the evacuation of those
translation.ja: 選ばれた人の避難の日程は

translation.en: who have been selected for the Ark
translation.ja: 選ばれた人の避難の日程は ８月12日から２日間となります

translation.en: will take no longer than two days, beginning on August 12th.
During this two-day period, no unofficial travel will be permitted.
translation.ja: 一般市民の旅行はこの２日間 禁止されます

translation.en: Those selected will be taken by bus and train to the underground Ark site by military personnel.
translation.ja: 当選者はバスまたは列車で軍隊が“方舟”に案内します

translation.en: Civil defense teams have been formed in every town with a population over 5,000.
translation.ja: 人口5000人以上の町には自警団が作られ―

translation.en: They will distribute supplies and organize group shelters
translation.ja: 支給品の配給や避難場所を

translation.en: in underground parking facilities and other appropriate sites.
translation.ja: 地下駐車場などに設置します

translation.en: -Construction plans -[phone rings] equipment lists, and locations for securing the necessary provisions...
translation.ja: 設計図や設備のリスト支給品の貯蔵場所は…

translation.en: -...along with information... -Yes, this is Ellen Beiderman.
-We've been preselected. -at www.fcda.gov.
Chuck? Chuck? Where are you going?
Our phone. They could be calling.
The only phones that ring
will be those of the people selected.
That's it.
That's all there is.
[Tanner] The interior camera circuitry is shot.
translation.ja: 船内カメラが切れてる

translation.en: So, Andy, can we get back into the cargo bay to reroute the video functions?
translation.ja: 隔室に入って回路を直せるか？

translation.en: [Andrea] Starboard cargo porthole's blown.
We could go in with the EVAs, but there's not much left in the life-support packs.
translation.ja: 宇宙服なら何とかでも酸素は少ないわ

translation.en: [Mark] We should be able to raise Houston on the low band once we get closer.
translation.ja: 地球に近づけば低周波で交信できる

translation.en: And the Orion is still functioning?
System check was okay, but I don't know about the radiation shielding.
translation.ja: 噴射はできるが放射能が心配だ

translation.en: So if we fire it up, we beat the comet back to Earth,
translation.ja: 使えば 彗星を追い越すが

translation.en: but we may end up glowing in the dark.
translation.ja: みんな 全滅しちまうかもな

translation.en: Okay, so, uh...
Anybody?
Let's go home.
[Robin] I have to say it's liberating
translation.ja: 連絡が来ないことは分かってた衝突まで４週間と２日

translation.en: knowing that I'm not going to be called.
translation.ja: 連絡が来ないことは分かってた衝突まで４週間と２日 衝突まで４週間と２日

translation.en: I don't think I've ever been happier.
translation.ja: 衝突まで４週間と２日幸せな気分よタバコまでやめた 幸せな気分よタバコまでやめた

translation.en: I've even stopped smoking.
translation.ja: 幸せな気分よタバコまでやめた

translation.en: What are you gonna do with all that extra money you save?
translation.ja: 浮いたお金で何するの？

translation.en: Do you know the National Gallery is saving all of the art? They're shipping it to the caves.
translation.ja: 国立美術館が美術品を地下都市に収容するの

translation.en: I've given them my beautiful 18th century desk from New England
translation.ja: うちの18世紀のニューイングランドの机と

translation.en: and all the Sheraton silver.
I really feel like I'd protected something when I gave them.
translation.ja: 私も何かを守った気になったわ

translation.en: [chuckles] You should see my apartment. There's nothing there.
translation.ja: もう私の部屋はカラッポよ

translation.en: It's practically Japanese.
Seems kind of unfair that I got picked.
You know, I'm not a doctor or a scientist.
translation.ja: 医者でも学者でもないのに

translation.en: People need continuity. Everyone knows you. And they trust you.
translation.ja: キャスターも必要だわ有名だし 信用があるのよ

translation.en: But I can't help you.
translation.ja: でもママすら助けられない

translation.en: Don't worry about me.
I'm gonna be happy as long as I know you're going to live.
translation.ja: あなたが助かれば幸せよ

translation.en: Mr. Hotchner?
Who did I think I was going to be when I bought that bike?
translation.ja: せっかくバイクを買ったのに

translation.en: Well, every kid on the block wants one now. Every parent on the block hates you for it.
translation.ja: 僕らの憧れです親は 嫌ってるけど

translation.en: Thank you, Leo. That's the best news I've had in years.
translation.ja: そうか　安心したよ

translation.en: Could you give me a hand over here for a second?
translation.ja: ちょっと手伝ってくれ

translation.en: -Yes, sir. -I just want to get these bars up.
-Hello, Mrs. Hotchner. -Hi, Leo. [Jenny on TV] A mob attacked and killed a Miami rental yard operator who was charging $5,000 an hour
translation.ja: トラクターなどを高額で貸していたレンタル業者が

translation.en: for backhoe and tractor rentals.
translation.ja: 強盗に殺害されました

translation.en: [Chuck] Same old crap on the TV.
I'm really sick of it, you know?
-Mrs. Hotchner? -Sarah's on the hill.
translation.ja: サラは？ 丘にいるわ

translation.en: Where were you today?
I've been looking all over for you. Why weren't you at school?
translation.ja: ずっと捜してた学校にも来ないで

translation.en: My dad said I didn't have to go. He said there's no point.
translation.ja: パパが もう学校なんていいって

translation.en: I talked to civil defense. They said if you and I got married we'd be family, and I could get you in.
translation.ja: 自警団が 僕たち結婚すれば君も行けるって

translation.en: Well, what about my parents? They're not your family.
translation.ja: でも私の両親はどうなるの？私ひとりじゃイヤよ

translation.en: -I don't want to go without my parents. -You don't have to.
translation.ja: でも私の両親はどうなるの？私ひとりじゃイヤよ 大丈夫　僕は有名人だ

translation.en: I'm the famous Leo Beiderman,
translation.ja: 大丈夫　僕は有名人だ

translation.en: and I haven't used my fame for anything. But I got them to let your family go too.
translation.ja: この名前を使って君の両親のことも頼む

translation.en: You... This is your only chance to survive.
[Jenny on TV] Across the country, looters continue to set fire to abandoned stores.
translation.ja: 国中で略奪 放火が続いていますが

translation.en: The fires have been left to burn since many firefighters have been called to help prepare shelters.
translation.ja: 避難所建設で消防士は不足しています

translation.en: Throughout Latin America's major cities,
business districts have been abandoned to looting gangs.
translation.ja: ビジネス街をギャングが…

translation.en: Emergency airlifts have been ruled out as too dangerous.
translation.ja: 救助も危険な状況です

translation.en: More street fighting in Moscow as food and fuel shortages continue.
translation.ja: モスクワでは食糧危機で街中で暴動が…

translation.en: [priest] "...believes all things, hopes all things,
translation.ja: すべてを信じ― すべてを望みすべてに耐える

translation.en: endures all things.
translation.ja: すべてを望みすべてに耐える

translation.en: When I was a child, I spoke like a child,
translation.ja: 幼子だった時幼子のように話し―

translation.en: I thought like a child, I reasoned like a child.
translation.ja: 幼子のように思い考えていた

translation.en: When I became a man, I gave up childish ways.
translation.ja: 成人した今幼子のことを捨てた

translation.en: For now, we see in a mirror dimly, but then face to face.
translation.ja: 今は ぼやけていてもやがて はっきり見える

translation.en: Now I know in part,
then I shall understand fully, even as I have been fully understood."
translation.ja: やがて お互いはっきり分かるようになる

translation.en: Do you, Leo, take Sarah to be your wife,
translation.ja: リオはサラを妻として

translation.en: to have and to hold from this day forward,
for better, for worse, for richer, for poorer,
translation.ja: いい時も悪い時も富める時も貧しい時も

translation.en: to love and to cherish?
I now pronounce you husband and wife.
Here, let me help you.
I'll get it.
Yeah. How you feeling?
-Fine. -I want to tell you something. You children didn't bring any real books to read, did you know that?
translation.ja: まったく 君らはまともな本を持ってない

translation.en: I brought Moby Dick and Huckleberry Finn and Baker and Simon had never read them.
translation.ja: 私は「ハックルベリー」と「白鯨」を持ってきた

translation.en: Now, I'm afraid to ask you, have you ever read Melville or Twain?
translation.ja: メルヴィルやトウェインを読んだことは？

translation.en: Hey, I'm a child of the movies, Fish.
translation.ja: 僕は映画で育ったんだ

translation.en: Okay, I see.
You got a shitty deal, Oren, you know that? You truly did.
translation.ja: 人生 損をしたな気の毒に

translation.en: -Don't worry about me. -Yeah.
I mean that. Really.
Don't worry about me.
My whole life I...
You know how it is for guys like us.
You... you and I, we're the same.
What do you mean by that? [chuckles]
